TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/StartPanel/PlaceListSeparator extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a for the bar that separates groups of items in the right side of the **Start** menu. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceListSeparator.Normal%2A>的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceListSeparator>类返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>表示组中的右侧的项的分隔条**启动**菜单。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceListSeparator.Normal%2A>属性。 若要运行此示例中，将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体。 处理该窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件，并调用`DrawVisualStyleElementStartPanelPlaceListSeparator1`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#222](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#222)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#222](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#222)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Normal As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the bar that separates groups of items in the right side of the **Start** menu.
Docs.value: 一个它表示组中的右侧的项的分隔条 * * 开始 * * 菜单。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceListSeparator.Normal%2A>属性以创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>返回的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceListSeparator.Normal%2A>属性。 若要运行此示例中，将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体。 处理该窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件，并调用`DrawVisualStyleElementStartPanelPlaceListSeparator1`方法从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件处理方法，传递`e`作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#222](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#222)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#222](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#222)]
